caption.p: Cartoon model of the structural superposition between the homology model of the 2019‐nCoV in blue and the nucleocapsid protein of SARS coronavirus (PDB code 2jw8.1) in orange. The red circle highlights the presence of an alpha‐helix on the SARS‐CoV and the absence of the 2019‐nCoV structure, and e positional difference of the beta‐sheets. SARS, severe acute respiratory syndrome
